programme.title: Beovulfs. Atgriešanās Šīldlendā
programme.desc: Stāsta par vareno cīnītāju Beovulfu ekranizējums. Viņš pirms divdesmit gadiem pameta Herotu, bet tagad ir atgriezties, lai meklētu mērķi un piederības sajūtu.

programme.title: Revolver
programme.desc: Guy Ritchie's action thriller, starring Jason Statham, Vincent Pastore and Ray Liotta. Gambler Jake spends seven years behind bars after taking the fall for mean crime boss Dorothy Macha. Upon his release, Jake foolishly takes on Macha in a card game and wins, prompting a hit to be put out on Jake. However, he refuses to go down without a fight and finds protection in an unlikely source. Andre Benjamin, Francesca Annis and Mark Strong also star.

programme.title: Slow TV: River
programme.desc: Relax, unwind, and immerse yourself in a series of calming films that celebrate a slower pace of life. The perfect viewing to escapes the stress of the 21st century.

programme.title: What's on Filmzone?
programme.desc: Introducing movies on Filmzone.

programme.title: Non-Stop
programme.desc: Action, starring Liam Neeson and Julianne Moore. A veteran air marshal receives anonymous text messages mid-flight, telling him that a multimillion dollar ransom must be paid or a passenger on board his plane will die every 20 minutes. Teaming up with a fellow traveller and a plucky flight attendant, he sets out to unmask the killer. However, the chase takes a surprising turn when the lawman becomes the prime suspect.

programme.title: Looper
programme.desc: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits – someone like Joe – who one day learns the mob wants to "close the loop" by sending back Joe's future self for assassination.

programme.title: Solaris
programme.desc: Dr. Gibarian, part of a team at a space station studying Solaris, makes an urgent and self-described bizarre video request to his friend, civilian psychiatrist Dr. Chris Kelvin, to come to the station to deal with an unspecified phenomenon aboard, that phenomenon with which Chris' experience and background may be able to explain and solve. Chris learns that his trip is sanctioned by the space program as a security force had been sent to the station to investigate, that security team which is now missing. When Chris arrives at the station, he finds only two surviving team members, Drs. Gordon and Snow (Dr. Gibarian committed suicide), who are both acting nervously. Chris also finds two unexpected people there, the first, who Chris only sees fleetingly, being Dr. Gibarian's adolescent son Michael, and the second being Chris' deceased wife, Rheya. Chris and Rheya had a passionate relationship in all its good and bad before she committed suicide.

programme.title: Elephant White
programme.desc: An assassin is hired by a businessman to avenge the murder of his daughter by white slave traders in Thailand.

programme.title: Bent
programme.desc: On his latest private investigation, a shamed former cop connects a murder case to a government conspiracy involving rogue agents from a top spy agency.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: Legal thriller, based on John Grisham's novel, starring John Cusack, Gene Hackman, Dustin Hoffman and Rachel Weisz. Several years after a gunman rampaged through an office building, killing at random, one of the victim's wives brings a case to court against the company who made the gun used in the attack. Behind the prosecution is jury consultant Rankin Fitch, who believes he has already bought his "not guilty" verdict. However, he reckons without a young man and his partner, who play a dangerous game of cat and mouse as they manipulate the jury from within for their own ends.

programme.title: What's on Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Introducing movies on Filmzone Plus.

programme.title: Slow TV: Restaurant
programme.desc: Relax, unwind, and immerse yourself in a series of calming films that celebrate a slower pace of life. The perfect viewing to escapes the stress of the 21st century.

Chris and Rheya had a passionate relationship in all its good and bad before she committed suicide.

programme.title: Midnight in Paris
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy set in Paris about a family that goes there because of business, and two young people who are engaged to be married in the fall have experiences there that change their lives. It's about a young man's great love for a city, Paris, and the illusion people have that a life different from theirs would be much better. It stars Owen Wilson, Rachel McAdams, Marion Cotillard, Kathy Bates, Carla Bruni, among others.

programme.title: Non-Stop
programme.desc: Action, starring Liam Neeson and Julianne Moore. Teaming up with a fellow traveller and a plucky flight attendant, he sets out to unmask the killer. However, the chase takes a surprising turn when the lawman becomes the prime suspect.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.

programme.title: Midnight in Paris
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy set in Paris about a family that goes there because of business, and two young people who are engaged to be married in the fall have experiences there that change their lives. It's about a young man's great love for a city, Paris, and the illusion people have that a life different from theirs would be much better. It stars Owen Wilson, Rachel McAdams, Marion Cotillard, Kathy Bates, Carla Bruni, among others.

programme.title: On the Basis of Sex
programme.desc: The true story of Ruth Bader Ginsburg, her struggles for equal rights, and the early cases of a historic career that lead to her nomination and confirmation as U.S. Supreme Court Associate Justice.

programme.title: Stay
programme.desc: Drama, starring Ewan McGregor and Ryan Gosling. Troubled art student Henry is furious when his usual therapist is replaced by stranger, and announces he will commit suicide at midnight the following Saturday. The new shrink, Sam, who has troubles of his own, races to find a way of helping his patient before disaster strikes. Naomi Watts and Bob Hoskins also star.

programme.title: Another Earth
programme.desc: Rhoda Williams, a bright young woman accepted into MIT's astrophysics program, aspires to explore the cosmos. A brilliant composer, John Burroughs, has just reached the pinnacle of his profession and is about to have a second child with his loving wife. On the eve of the discovery of a duplicate Earth, tragedy strikes and the lives of these strangers become irrevocably intertwined. Estranged from the world and the selves they once knew, the two outsiders begin an unlikely love affair and reawaken to life. But when one is presented with the chance of a lifetime opportunity to travel to the other Earth and embrace an alternative reality, which new life will they choose?

programme.title: On the Basis of Sex
programme.desc: The true story of Ruth Bader Ginsburg, her struggles for equal rights, and the early cases of a historic career that lead to her nomination and confirmation as U.S. Supreme Court Associate Justice.

programme.title: Nr. 309
programme.desc: Starring Demet Özdemir, and Furkan Palalı, this Turkish drama series follows the travails of a family as they try to carry out the wishes of the deceased patriarch, a multi-milionaire who has stipulated that the first of his grandchildren to marry and produce a child will inherit his share of the family business. The dead father's daughters rush to set up blind dates for their children and it is under these circumstances that Onur and Lale meet. Their date is fun-filled and full of crazy drunkenness. But when they wake up the next morning on room no. 309 of a hotel, neither can remember exactly what transpired the previous night. Agreeing to part company and never to see each other again, they go their seperate ways. However, three months later, Lale realises that she is pregnant and that Onur must be the father.

programme.title: Nāra
programme.desc: Rina nolēmusi, ka nepieciešams jauns risinājums nāru mājokļu jautājumā. Viņu slēpšana kļūst aizvien sarežģītāka. Bens kļuvis par Levi mentoru, kurš mēģina uzzināt, kā vīrieši uzvedas uz zemes. Madija nespēj pieņemt savas mātes atgriešanos viņas dzīvē.

programme.title: Nāra
programme.desc: Rina tuprina mēģināt pārējām nārām iemācīt cilvēcīgumu, taču dažas sāk izrādīt pretestību, liekot Rinai pārdomāt, vai viņa nav kļuvusi pārlieku cilvēciska. Madija nonākusi bīstamā situācijā, palīdzot savai mātei. Tikmēr Bens un Ksandjērs gatavojas strādāt kopā, lai nāras nogādātu atpakaļ ūdenī.

programme.title: Vientuļo vecāku klubiņš
programme.desc: Vientuļo vecāku grupa veido savu atbalsta sistēmu, kas palīdzētu viņiem audzināt bērnus un nodibināt jaunas attiecības.

programme.title: Džeimijs gatavo Itālijā
programme.desc: "Džeimija itāļu ēdieni" ir Itālijas virtuves godināšana. Džeimijs vēlas dalīties savā kaislē pret itāļu ēdieniem, piedāvājot nedārgas karbonaras, vistas, pildītu fokaksiju, pīrāgu, ziedkāpostu un tiramisu receptes. Šis ir stāsts par pasaules iemīļotākās virtuves prieka un kaisles ienešanu jūsu mājās.

programme.title: Ēnu čuksti
programme.desc: Ghost Whisperer is an American supernatural TV series that follows the life of Melinda Gordon, a young woman with the ability to talk to ghosts, as she struggles to live as close to normal a life as she can. She helps earthbound spirits to cross over to the other world as their earthly representative. Whether it's guilt or some unfinished business that is keeping them from attaining eternal peace, it's up to Melinda to figure it all out.

programme.title: Nr. 309
programme.desc: Starring Demet Özdemir, and Furkan Palalı, this Turkish drama series follows the travails of a family as they try to carry out the wishes of the deceased patriarch, a multi-milionaire who has stipulated that the first of his grandchildren to marry and produce a child will inherit his share of the family business. The dead father's daughters rush to set up blind dates for their children and it is under these circumstances that Onur and Lale meet. Their date is fun-filled and full of crazy drunkenness. But when they wake up the next morning on room no. 309 of a hotel, neither can remember exactly what transpired the previous night. Agreeing to part company and never to see each other again, they go their seperate ways. However, three months later, Lale realises that she is pregnant and that Onur must be the father.

programme.title: Čikāga liesmās
programme.desc: Stāsts par Čikāgas ugunsdzēsēju un paramdeiķu brigādi – viņu ikdienu, izsaukumiem uz notikumu vietām, bīstamo un pašaizliedzīgo darbu, kā arī savstarpējām attiecībām. Situācija saasinās, kad kādā no glābšanas operācijām bojā iet viens no ugunsdzēsējiem, un viņa kolēģi notikušajā vaino paši sevi viens otru. Tomēr viņiem nākas pārvarēt savas nesaskaņas, jo uz nelaimes gadījumu vietām jādodas kā vienotai un saskaņotai komandai.

programme.title: Nāra
programme.desc: Deila risina Madijas un Rinas sastrādāto, kamēr Katrīna turpina tvarstīt pārējās nāras, lai tās nostātos viņas pusē – pat ja tas nozīmē brutālu izturēšanos kā pret nārām, tā cilvēkiem.

programme.title: 19. ugunsdzēsēju depo
programme.desc: Station 19 is an American action-drama television series, the second spin-off to Grey's Anatomy. The series is set in Seattle and focuses on the lives of the men and women at Seattle Fire Station 19. Fearless firefighters risk their lives to save the others, but first of all they are ordinary people, so passions run very high. Andy is a young woman, a Lieutenant at Station 19 and the daughter of Captain Pruitt Herrera, she has literally grown up at this fire station and decides to follow her father's steps. She is straightforward and very independent. Ben is her new coworker, he is a former anesthesiologist. It's not easy for him to adjust to new working environment and work fellows, but he is struggling to survive and working hard.

programme.title: 19. ugunsdzēsēju depo
programme.desc: Station 19 is an American action-drama television series, the second spin-off to Grey's Anatomy. She is straightforward and very independent. Ben is her new coworker, he is a former anesthesiologist. programme.title: Kāsla metode
programme.desc: Vai zināji, ka slavenā detektīvu rakstnieka Kāsla pilnais vārds ir Ričards Edgars Aleksandrs Rodžerss Kāsls? Tieši šo vārdu tu dzirdēsi ļoti atbildīgā brīdī – kad Beketa sniegs atbildi uz Kāsla bildinājumu, ko viņš beidzot saņemsies izteikt. Ko viņa atbildēs un kā attīstīsies abu attiecības, ņemot vērā, ka Beketa saņēmusi kārdinošu darba piedāvājumu citā pilsētā? To tu uzzināsi, skatoties sestās sezonas sērijas! Savukārt savulaik iemīļotā seriāla "Doktors Hauss" cienītāji būs patīkami pārsteigti, ieraugot Beketas jauno pārinieci – kas ir neviena cita kā daktere Kadija jeb Lisa Edelšteina. Tevi gaida neparastas lietas, negaidīti notikumu pavērsieni un iespēja risināt izmeklēšanas mīklas un cilvēcisko attiecību pārpratumus.

programme.title: Kāsla metode
programme.desc: Vai zināji, ka slavenā detektīvu rakstnieka Kāsla pilnais vārds ir Ričards Edgars Aleksandrs Rodžerss Kāsls? Tieši šo vārdu tu dzirdēsi ļoti atbildīgā brīdī – kad Beketa sniegs atbildi uz Kāsla bildinājumu, ko viņš beidzot saņemsies izteikt. programme.title: Bīstamās mammītes
programme.desc: Mayte Soldevilla, a divorced mother of two, invites a group of people to her house in an attempt to sell them kitchen appliances but only three of her friends show up- Lourdes Sanguino, Virginia Torres and Amparo Pérez and a woman named Elvira who joins them in the last minute. During the demonstration of TurboThunder 3000, machine malfunctions and accidentally causes Elvira's death. Since Elvira was making their lives difficult and they all had motives for killing her, and in fear that the people around them will think that they did it on purpose, four women will try to hide the tragic outcome. That will be easier said that done, as they find themselves in crazy situations and a dangerous spiral of crimes to protect their secret in this outrageous dark comedy series.

programme.title: Nr. 309
programme.desc: Starring Demet Özdemir, and Furkan Palalı, this Turkish drama series follows the travails of a family as they try to carry out the wishes of the deceased patriarch, a multi-milionaire who has stipulated that the first of his grandchildren to marry and produce a child will inherit his share of the family business. The dead father's daughters rush to set up blind dates for their children and it is under these circumstances that Onur and Lale meet. Their date is fun-filled and full of crazy drunkenness. But when they wake up the next morning on room no. 309 of a hotel, neither can remember exactly what transpired the previous night. Agreeing to part company and never to see each other again, they go their seperate ways. However, three months later, Lale realises that she is pregnant and that Onur must be the father.

programme.title: 19. ugunsdzēsēju depo
programme.desc: Station 19 is an American action-drama television series, the second spin-off to Grey's Anatomy. The series is set in Seattle and focuses on the lives of the men and women at Seattle Fire Station 19. Fearless firefighters risk their lives to save the others, but first of all they are ordinary people, so passions run very high. Andy is a young woman, a Lieutenant at Station 19 and the daughter of Captain Pruitt Herrera, she has literally grown up at this fire station and decides to follow her father's steps. She is straightforward and very independent. Ben is her new coworker, he is a former anesthesiologist. It's not easy for him to adjust to new working environment and work fellows, but he is struggling to survive and working hard.

programme.title: Grejas anatomija
programme.desc: Hakeris ielauzies slimnīcas datorsistēmās, liekot monitoriem, telefoniem, laboratorijām un pacientu datiem vienā mirklī sākt streikot. Pieviļot tehnoloģijām, Bailija mēģina saglabāt mieru, bet ārstiem nākas kļūt radošiem savu pacientu ārstēšanā.

programme.title: Grejas anatomija
programme.desc: Grejas anatomija ir drāma par intensīvo medicīnas apmācību, ko papildina jautrība, seksīgums un reizēm traģiskums to cilvēku dzīvēs, kuri drīz vien apjautīs, ka ne medicīna, ne arī attiecības var tikt dalītas melnajā un baltajā.

programme.title: Ēnu čuksti
programme.desc: Ghost Whisperer is an American supernatural TV series that follows the life of Melinda Gordon, a young woman with the ability to talk to ghosts, as she struggles to live as close to normal a life as she can. She helps earthbound spirits to cross over to the other world as their earthly representative. Whether it's guilt or some unfinished business that is keeping them from attaining eternal peace, it's up to Melinda to figure it all out.

programme.title: Čikāga liesmās
programme.desc: Stāsts par Čikāgas ugunsdzēsēju un paramdeiķu brigādi – viņu ikdienu, izsaukumiem uz notikumu vietām, bīstamo un pašaizliedzīgo darbu, kā arī savstarpējām attiecībām. Situācija saasinās, kad kādā no glābšanas operācijām bojā iet viens no ugunsdzēsējiem, un viņa kolēģi notikušajā vaino paši sevi viens otru. Tomēr viņiem nākas pārvarēt savas nesaskaņas, jo uz nelaimes gadījumu vietām jādodas kā vienotai un saskaņotai komandai.

programme.title: Nāra
programme.desc: Spriedze turpina pieaugt, jo īpaši pēc šokējoša atklājuma. Dzīve akvārijā nevis okeānā sāk atspoguļoties nāru uzvedībā. Cerot glābt sev līdzīgos, Rina noslēdz vienošanos ar netipisku sabiedroto.

programme.title: Nr. 309
programme.desc: Starring Demet Özdemir, and Furkan Palalı, this Turkish drama series follows the travails of a family as they try to carry out the wishes of the deceased patriarch, a multi-milionaire who has stipulated that the first of his grandchildren to marry and produce a child will inherit his share of the family business. Agreeing to part company and never to see each other again, they go their seperate ways. However, three months later, Lale realises that she is pregnant and that Onur must be the father.

programme.title: Forged in Fire: Knife or Death
programme.desc: Swords, daggers and knives have been used for millennia competitively and on the battlefield to determine who is victorious. In this competition series, our blade-wielding contestants go through a range of challenges that will test their skills and their weapons. Using blades that they have forged themselves, or have had constructed to their stipulations, competitors must use their own accuracy, and precision and the strength and sharpness of their knife if they want to be crowned champion. But it is not only honour that they are seeking – there is also a prize of $20,000 up for grabs. Forged in Fire: Knife or Death is hosted by former NFL player and professional wrestler Bill Goldberg. His co-host is martial artist and former Special Forces Soldier, Tu Lam.

programme.title: Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: A group of experienced storage hunters are searching for jewels in storage units across New York. They go treasure hunting hoping to make a bundle. All of them are from different walks of life and have their own original style.

programme.title: Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: A group of experienced storage hunters are searching for jewels in storage units across New York. They go treasure hunting hoping to make a bundle. All of them are from different walks of life and have their own original style.

programme.title: Forged in Fire
programme.desc: Forged in Fire, an American competition series aired on the History Channel, challenges four new competitors to produce a knife in their own style with a small variety of metal objects to create from. The series, hosted by Wil Willis, consists of a three-round elimination contest to forge bladed weapons, with the final winner receiving $10,000 and the day's championship title. Judged by experts in weapon history and use, the last two people standing must create in their own forge a Moro Kris sword, a blade which dates back to 300BC, in just five days. Filmed in Brooklyn, New York, the set referred to as "The Forge" sets the scene for this suspenseful show with propane forges, power hammers and hydraulic presses, with medical personnel being close by to treat any injuries or other health problems. If the medical personnel suspect that the competitors are unable to continue safely, they will be disqualified. Once each competitor has created their weapon, it will be put through a series of tests including chopping/slashing/stabbing objects such as ropes, ice blocks, animal carcasses and steel car doors. Having to meet a number of criteria's, the smiths battle it out, without their swords, to become the best black-smith.

programme.title: World's Greatest Treasure Mysteries
programme.desc: In all corners of the globe there are whispers of hidden treasures, abandoned loots lost in time, just waiting to be found. This documentary series follows Rick and Marty Lagina as they dive into some of the most famous treasure hunts known to man, examining previous expeditions, divulging fascinating details and, in some cases, unearthing exciting new evidence. These hunters are devoted to the cause, exploring every angle to advance the search of forgotten treasures.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold & Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: There is getting in touch with nature and then there are these lot. Imagine ridding yourself of the complexities of modern life and living completely off the grid, this TV documentary series highlights the lives of several individuals doing just that and shows viewers how they survive outside of society. Mountain Men covers individuals making a living by hunting and trapping from the Appalachian Mountains to the Rocky Mountains of Alaska. In times of winter, the cold and snowy conditions makes life almost impossible but these men show how to thrive and earn money in such difficult circumstances.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is an American TV series in a documentary style focusing on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers' contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Pawn Stars South Africa
programme.desc: Reality series spin-off of the successful Pawn Stars set in the USA. Join Roy Peretz, owner of the pawn shop Cash Inn, and his team of sales assistants as they attempt to buy-then-sell the items their customers bring in. Set in Johannesburg (famed for its historic gold mining past) Roy, along with partners Eytan and Liel, must haggle with customers to get the best price, with the help of their expert friends. Roy has an eye for a bargain and never backs down when he sees something he wants! From ancient hunting kits to lost treasures, each artefact has its own fascinating history, and also its price..

Having to meet a number of criteria's, the smiths battle it out, without their swords, to become the best black-smith.

programme.title: Forged in Fire
programme.desc: Forged in Fire, an American competition series aired on the History Channel, challenges four new competitors to produce a knife in their own style with a small variety of metal objects to create from. The series, hosted by Wil Willis, consists of a three-round elimination contest to forge bladed weapons, with the final winner receiving $10,000 and the day's championship title. Judged by experts in weapon history and use, the last two people standing must create in their own forge a Moro Kris sword, a blade which dates back to 300BC, in just five days. Filmed in Brooklyn, New York, the set referred to as "The Forge" sets the scene for this suspenseful show with propane forges, power hammers and hydraulic presses, with medical personnel being close by to treat any injuries or other health problems. If the medical personnel suspect that the competitors are unable to continue safely, they will be disqualified. Once each competitor has created their weapon, it will be put through a series of tests including chopping/slashing/stabbing objects such as ropes, ice blocks, animal carcasses and steel car doors. Having to meet a number of criteria's, the smiths battle it out, without their swords, to become the best black-smith.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is an American TV series in a documentary style focusing on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold & Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Lego Friends: Girls On A Mission
programme.desc: There is a mission and it is not an easy one! Heartlake City is under a lot of pressure from some very bad people who do very bad things. The LEGO Friends are five young girls who all have a really close friendship: best friends Andrea, Emma, Mia, Olivia and Stephanie have extremely kind girls who decide to dedicate all of their time into protecting the people who live in the city. Whether they are saving people from a huge fire; stopping mayhem caused by the Alvahbots or ridding the sea from a load of unwanted trash – the LEGO Friends will always have a solution and will do it without complaining! Every day, the girls are faced with a brand new challenge that is completely unexpected. Who knows what the challenge will be; how will they fix the problem? Children's animated television series.

programme.title: Barbie Princess Adventure
programme.desc: With new friends in a new kingdom, Barbie learns what it means to be herself when she trades places with a royal lookalike in this musical adventure.

programme.title: Transformers: Cyberverse
programme.desc: Transformers: Cyberverse is a cel shaded computer animated series based on the Transformers toy franchise. Bumblebee receives an important task, several lives depend on him but the problem is that he has forgotten everything! It's a good thing that his friend and partner Windblade comes to the rescue and helps him repair his damaged memory files. Each new memory reopens Bumblebee's past adventures on Cybertron, before arrival to Earth. He experiences fun moments with his friends all over again, moments that changed his life. This past has made him the hero we all know. Each step in fighting Bumblebee's amnesia provides new tips to the friends, so sooner or later it will help them perform their mission and stay away from trouble.

programme.title: Tobot
programme.desc: Tobot is a South Korean animated TV series featuring transforming cars, some of which are designed after Kia Motors vehicles. Twin brothers Ryan and Kory live with their father, Dr. Franklin Char, robot technology expert, in a small town. Dr. Franklin Char has become physically handicapped after a car accident, in which his wife died. But he holds up well and decides to create robots for his sons, who will protect and support them and be their friends. Twins are going to have unforgettable adventures.

programme.title: Enchantimals: Sunny Savanna
programme.desc: The Wonderwood besties help the Sunny Savanna crew prepare for the Sparkle Spectacular, joining in on the glittery fun and learning important lessons along the way. Because, in Sunny Savanna, we're always better together.

programme.desc: Most wanted, most traced, most current music videos for the teenage fans.

programme.title: The Wild Adventures of Blinky Bill
programme.desc: Australian cartoon series about a mischievous little koala called Blinky Bill and his best mate Jacko who live in the town of Greenpatch. Blinky Bill may be small but he's taken it upon himself to look after his hometown and its residents. So whether it's protecting his neighbours from a dangerous crocodile, helping a princess find her prince or defending Greenpatch against aliens, Blinky Bill is always on hand to help out. Based on the best-selling children's books by a New Zealand-born writer and illustrator, Dorothy Wall. Blinky Bill is thought of as a classic children's character in Australia and has been entertaining kids around the world for decades.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Secrets of Hidden Spinjitsu
programme.desc: Ninjago was created by the First Master of Spinjitzu using the Four Golden Weapons. Wu and Garmadon fought, and the older brother, Garmadon, was banished to the Underworld. Peace didn't last for long, as Garmadon had sent Skeletons from the underworld to steal the four Weapons. Sensei Wu found four teenagers to train as ninja; Kai, Jay, Cole, and Zane, one of whom, Kai, had a sister, Nya, who had been captured by the Skeletons.

programme.title: Power Rangers Beast Morphers
programme.desc: This action programme is set in the future, and follows the Power Rangers, but not as we have always known them. A secret agency has combined a new substance, called "Morph-X" , with animal DNA to create the Power Rangers Morphers team. Together, these Rangers fight an evil virus, which is determined to take all of the Ranger power, stored inside the Morphin Grid. This set of heroes fiercely protect this, in a tale of adventure, excitement, and also great risk. There's no rest for these Rangers, and they are always on high alert, ready to fight evil.

programme.title: Treasure Trekkers
programme.desc: Treasure Trekkers follows the intrepid adventures of three heroic mouse-sized adventurers, who are tasked with preserving and protecting the priceless treasures of the world. Mo, Mac and Mip embark on challenging quests unearthing rare and sometimes magical artifacts, whilst learning to navigate their differences and discovering that the most precious treasures – friendship, kindness and respect – are the ones that come from within.

programme.title: Stoked
programme.desc: Stoked is a story about six teens and their not so wonderful summer jobs on the majestical Sunset Island. They spend their summer working at resort which turns out to be more than they bargained for, the hours are bad, the uniforms suck, and their manager isn´t the nicest of people, but they de-stress by surfing the choicest waves when they don´t have to work.

programme.title: Jessie
programme.desc: Jessie is an American comedy television series about a young girl, Jessie Prescott from Texas who moves to New York and becomes a nanny in a wealthy family. The Ross family she works for lives in a multimillion-dollar penthouse on the Upper West Side. The four kids, Emma, Luke, Ravi and Zuri are quite uncontrolled, but Jessie gets on well with them very fast and the real fun begins. Step by step Jessie makes every day of quiet and steady life of the Ross family feel like it's Christmas, as she is full of energy, jokes and enthusiasm.

programme.title: Wizards of Waverly Place
programme.desc: Wizards of Waverly Place is an American fantasy teen sitcom focusing on three Russo siblings with magical abilities. The Russo family are nothing but ordinary: their father is a former family wizard, and their mother is mortal. When the Russo siblings complete their wizard training, they have to participate in a competition to decide who will become the Family Wizard and keep magical powers forever, while the others lose their powers and become mortals.

programme.title: Jungle Bunch
programme.desc: This CGI animation follows the story of 'The Jungle Bunch', a self-proclaimed group of disparate jungle animals who have taken it upon themselves to protect other creatures from the many threats and dangers that can lurk in the depths of the jungle. Led by warrior tiger Maurice (who is actually a penguin!), the crew are made up of Maurice's adopted son, Junior, who is learning the ropes; Miguel the strong gorilla, tarsier Gilbert, who has all the smarts; compassionate Batricia, the bat; and the inseparable toads Al and Bob. The troop represent justice and hope and are always ready for fun and adventure.

But the Gormiti, the residents of the island, have always known that harmony would not last forever. They knew the fearful Magor, the leader of the Volcano tribe, would one day return for revenge. The Gormiti warriors from four other tribes – Earth, Air, Sea, and Forest – must work together to defeat him and his tribe.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Pony Life
programme.desc: Based on the eponymous Hasbro toy line "My Little Pony: Pony Life" is the fifth animated series to have been created following the huge success of the franchise. The ponies enjoy delightful adventures together, with the main characters, known as the Mane Six, comprised of Twilight Sparkle, Applejack, Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy, Pinkie Pie, Rarity, and Spike. Their colourful adventures vary wildly, racing across their vivid world in competitive challenges and exciting escapades. Accompany the enchanting ponies on another enjoyable series of fun!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Thomas and Friends presents life on Island of Sodor somewhere in Britain. There are several railways where all machines are animate creatures, they live and work there. Each of them tries to perform their job perfectly. The main character is a little blue tank engine Thomas, who travels to different places, gets to know different people and helps everybody who need it. Sometimes Thomas makes mistakes but it only teaches him not to repeat them in future. His friends are as hardworking as he is. Thomas and his team deliver mails, repair railway, take passengers wherever they need. Thomas and Friends can teach young viewers significant lessons of true value of friendship and importance of teamwork.

programme.title: Moominvalley
programme.desc: This award-winning animation from Finland follows the adventures of our protagonist, the curious, perceptive and optimistic Moomintroll. The viewer can enjoy this coming-of-age tale as our teenage hero attempts to overcome the obstacles of growing up within his beloved family unit while still being true to his own individual character. He has a loving mother, Moominmama, and a sentimental father, Moominpapa who he lives with in harmony with their natural surroundings. He also enjoys adventures to the magical land beyond Moominvalley with his friends, the free-spirited wanderer Snufkin, the chaotic Little My, daydreamer Snorkmaiden, cowardly Sniff, and many others.

programme.title: Heidi
programme.desc: Heidi is a little girl who is full of beans. She faces many problems up in the Swiss alps whilst living with her grandfather. Heidi lights up and soothes the people and animals all around her, with her enthusiastic, generous and wonderful zest for life. This bubbly, young orphan girl will learn the priceless value of friendship and mutual respect. Follow her journey as she dicovers life's ups and downs.

programme.title: Andi Mack
programme.desc: On the eve of her 13th birthdday, Andi's (Peyton Elizabeth Lee) free spirited big sister, Bex, returns home from her nomadic travels around the world. Andi is delighted at the prospect of having an exciting accomplice who can help her to bend her mother's strict rules and who she can learn from. However, it is soon diisclosed that Bex is, in fact, Andi's real mother and Celia, who Andi thought was her mother, is really her grandmother. This shocking revelation forces Andi to embark on a contemplative journey of self diiscovery. She is helped by her best friends Cyrus and Buffy who are also trying to find their way in the world. This is a heart warming coming-of-age tale that touches on some adult themes in a positive manner while also being loads of fun!

programme.desc: Stoked is a story about six teens and their not so wonderful summer jobs on the majestical Sunset Island. They spend their summer working at resort which turns out to be more than they bargained for, the hours are bad, the uniforms suck, and their manager isn´t the nicest of people, but they de-stress by surfing the choicest waves when they don´t have to work.

programme.title: Lego Friends: Girls On A Mission
programme.desc: There is a mission and it is not an easy one! Heartlake City is under a lot of pressure from some very bad people who do very bad things. The LEGO Friends are five young girls who all have a really close friendship: best friends Andrea, Emma, Mia, Olivia and Stephanie have extremely kind girls who decide to dedicate all of their time into protecting the people who live in the city. Whether they are saving people from a huge fire; stopping mayhem caused by the Alvahbots or ridding the sea from a load of unwanted trash – the LEGO Friends will always have a solution and will do it without complaining! Every day, the girls are faced with a brand new challenge that is completely unexpected. Who knows what the challenge will be; how will they fix the problem? Children's animated television series.

programme.title: Lego Friends: Girls On A Mission
programme.desc: There is a mission and it is not an easy one! Heartlake City is under a lot of pressure from some very bad people who do very bad things. The LEGO Friends are five young girls who all have a really close friendship: best friends Andrea, Emma, Mia, Olivia and Stephanie have extremely kind girls who decide to dedicate all of their time into protecting the people who live in the city. Whether they are saving people from a huge fire; stopping mayhem caused by the Alvahbots or ridding the sea from a load of unwanted trash – the LEGO Friends will always have a solution and will do it without complaining! Every day, the girls are faced with a brand new challenge that is completely unexpected. Who knows what the challenge will be; how will they fix the problem? Children's animated television series.

programme.title: Transformers: Cyberverse
programme.desc: Transformers: Cyberverse is a cel shaded computer animated series based on the Transformers toy franchise. Bumblebee receives an important task, several lives depend on him but the problem is that he has forgotten everything! It's a good thing that his friend and partner Windblade comes to the rescue and helps him repair his damaged memory files. Each new memory reopens Bumblebee's past adventures on Cybertron, before arrival to Earth. He experiences fun moments with his friends all over again, moments that changed his life. This past has made him the hero we all know. Each step in fighting Bumblebee's amnesia provides new tips to the friends, so sooner or later it will help them perform their mission and stay away from trouble.

programme.title: Transformers: Cyberverse

programme.title: Tobot
programme.desc: Tobot is a South Korean animated TV series featuring transforming cars, some of which are designed after Kia Motors vehicles. Twin brothers Ryan and Kory live with their father, Dr. Franklin Char, robot technology expert, in a small town. Dr. Franklin Char has become physically handicapped after a car accident, in which his wife died. But he holds up well and decides to create robots for his sons, who will protect and support them and be their friends. Twins are going to have unforgettable adventures.

programme.title: Enchantimals: Sunny Savanna
programme.desc: The Wonderwood besties help the Sunny Savanna crew prepare for the Sparkle Spectacular, joining in on the glittery fun and learning important lessons along the way. Because, in Sunny Savanna, we're always better together.

programme.title: Kidz Megamix
programme.desc: Most wanted, most traced, most current music videos for the teenage fans.

programme.title: Tobot
programme.desc: Izmeklējot virkni satiksmes negadījumu, Dr. Frenklins Čars tiek nolaupīts. Tas aktivizē viņa radītos Tobotus. Pirmie divi Toboti tiek uzticēti viņa dēliem Raienam un Korijam, lai apkaimi sargātu no noziedzības.

programme.title: Polly Pocket
programme.desc: Kad Pollija Poketa manto burvju medaljonu, kas viņai ļauj sevi samazināt līdz 10 centimetru augumam, viņa atklāj, ka šo mazo spēju un saraušanās priekšrocība ir LIELI PIEDZĪVOJUMI un LIELAS PĀRMAIŅAS viņai un viņas draugiem.

programme.title: Blinkijs Bils
programme.desc: Blinkija Bila un viņa drauga Džeko piedzīvojumi, aizsargājot savas Austrālijas mājas no īstiem un izdomātiem draudiem.

programme.title: Tas ir Džojs
programme.desc: Tas ir Džojs! Ja uzskatāt, ka katrai problēmai ir garlaicīgs risinājums, jūs nepazīstat Džoju! Ar draugiem Olivu un Jasīnu viņš atradīs atjautīgākos un negaidītākos risinājumus, lai izkultos no nelāgām situācijām un palīdzētu citiem.

programme.title: Tas ir Džojs

programme.title: Remija un Bū
programme.desc: Unikāla mazas meitenes Remijas un lieliska robota Bū draudzība. Remija ir zinātkāra sešus gadus veca meitene ar unikālu labāko draugu – Bū, lielu, mīkstu, rozā robotu. Ar Remijas mērķtiecību un Bū prasmēm viņu dienas Delfīnbejā ir abu iztēles radītu piedzīvojumu pilnas.

programme.title: Remija un Bū
programme.desc: Unikāla mazas meitenes Remijas un lieliska robota Bū draudzība. Remija ir zinātkāra sešus gadus veca meitene ar unikālu labāko draugu – Bū, lielu, mīkstu, rozā robotu. Ar Remijas mērķtiecību un Bū prasmēm viņu dienas Delfīnbejā ir abu iztēles radītu piedzīvojumu pilnas.

programme.title: Enchantimals: Saulainā Savanna
programme.desc: Brīnummeža draugi palīdz Saulainās Savannas iemītniekiem sagatavoties Spīguļojošajai Izrādei, paši iesaistoties vizuļojošajā jautrībā un vienlaikus gūstot svarīgas mācības. Saulainajā Savannā kopā vienmēr ir jautrāk.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ir jauka, nekaunīga cūciņa, kas dzīvo ar savu mazo brāli Džordžu, kā arī sivēnu mammu un tēti. Pepas mīļākās nodarbes ir spēļu spēlēšana, pucēšanās, laiskošanās un rotaļāšanās dubļainās peļķēs. Viņas piedzīvojumi allaž beidzas laimīgi, skaļi un rukšķīgi skanot smiekliem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ir jauka, nekaunīga cūciņa, kas dzīvo ar savu mazo brāli Džordžu, kā arī sivēnu mammu un tēti. Pepas mīļākās nodarbes ir spēļu spēlēšana, pucēšanās, laiskošanās un rotaļāšanās dubļainās peļķēs. Viņas piedzīvojumi allaž beidzas laimīgi, skaļi un rukšķīgi skanot smiekliem.

programme.title: Kindi Kids
programme.desc: Animated children's series based on the toy range of the same name. Kindi Kids follows the adventures of a delightful group of colourful humans that live playfully in tribes. Each tribe is centered around a unique aspect or behaviour, such as the Shoppets, who are mischievous creatures always looking to cause destruction to their magical world, Rainbow Kindi. All of the tribes live in Rainbow Kindi, a vibrant and vivid world where the characters interact, often leading to hilarious events and situations. Young children are invited to join the colourful characters as they enjoy yet another series of amazing adventures.

programme.title: Alas klubs "Cave Club"
programme.desc: Esiet sveicināti piedzīvojumu, izpētes un pat dinozauru pasaulē. Kopā ar pieciem draugiem atklājiet negaidītu mūsdienas populārāko tendenču izcelsmi un risiniet visiem zināmas problēmas. Šie labākie draugi būs pirmie, kas visu redzēs un darīs, sākot ar pašu pirmo labāko draugu grupu "Alas klubs".

programme.title: Heidija
programme.desc: Heidija ir maza meitene ar lieliem sapņiem. Viņa Šveices alpos, dzīvojot ar vectēvu,saskaras ar daudzām problēmām. Heidija iepriecina un nomierina cilvēkus un dzīvniekus viņas tuvumā, ar savu entuziasmu, dāsnumu un burvīgo dzīvesprieku. Šī jaunā bārene

programme.title: Mans mazais ponijs: draudzība ir brīnums
programme.desc: Saņemot brīdinājumu par šausmīgu pareģojumu, Princese Celestia uz Poniju zemi sūta savu studenti Sparklu. Tā viņa cer pārliecināties, ka viss tiek sagatavots kā nākas, un ka jauniete iegūs vairākus draugus.

programme.desc: Pepa ir jauka, nekaunīga cūciņa, kas dzīvo ar savu mazo brāli Džordžu, kā arī sivēnu mammu un tēti. Pepas mīļākās nodarbes ir spēļu spēlēšana, pucēšanās, laiskošanās un rotaļāšanās dubļainās peļķēs. Viņas piedzīvojumi allaž beidzas laimīgi, skaļi un rukšķīgi skanot smiekliem.

programme.title: Heidija
programme.desc: Heidija ir maza meitene ar lieliem sapņiem. Viņa Šveices alpos, dzīvojot ar vectēvu,saskaras ar daudzām problēmām. Heidija iepriecina un nomierina cilvēkus un dzīvniekus viņas tuvumā, ar savu entuziasmu, dāsnumu un burvīgo dzīvesprieku. Šī jaunā bārene

programme.title: Polly Pocket
programme.desc: Kad Pollija Poketa manto burvju medaljonu, kas viņai ļauj sevi samazināt līdz 10 centimetru augumam, viņa atklāj, ka šo mazo spēju un saraušanās priekšrocība ir LIELI PIEDZĪVOJUMI un LIELAS PĀRMAIŅAS viņai un viņas draugiem.

programme.title: Kindi Kids
programme.desc: Animated children's series based on the toy range of the same name. Kindi Kids follows the adventures of a delightful group of colourful humans that live playfully in tribes. Each tribe is centered around a unique aspect or behaviour, such as the Shoppets, who are mischievous creatures always looking to cause destruction to their magical world, Rainbow Kindi. All of the tribes live in Rainbow Kindi, a vibrant and vivid world where the characters interact, often leading to hilarious events and situations. Young children are invited to join the colourful characters as they enjoy yet another series of amazing adventures.

programme.title: Enchantimals: Saulainā Savanna
programme.desc: Brīnummeža draugi palīdz Saulainās Savannas iemītniekiem sagatavoties Spīguļojošajai Izrādei, paši iesaistoties vizuļojošajā jautrībā un vienlaikus gūstot svarīgas mācības. Saulainajā Savannā kopā vienmēr ir jautrāk.

programme.title: Blinkijs Bils
programme.desc: Blinkija Bila un viņa drauga Džeko piedzīvojumi, aizsargājot savas Austrālijas mājas no īstiem un izdomātiem draudiem.

programme.title: Blinkijs Bils
programme.desc: Blinkija Bila un viņa drauga Džeko piedzīvojumi, aizsargājot savas Austrālijas mājas no īstiem un izdomātiem draudiem.

programme.title: Alas klubs "Cave Club"
programme.desc: Esiet sveicināti piedzīvojumu, izpētes un pat dinozauru pasaulē. Kopā ar pieciem draugiem atklājiet negaidītu mūsdienas populārāko tendenču izcelsmi un risiniet visiem zināmas problēmas. Šie labākie draugi būs pirmie, kas visu redzēs un darīs, sākot ar pašu pirmo labāko draugu grupu "Alas klubs".

programme.title: Mazā pīlēna sapnis
programme.desc: Multiplikācijas īsfilmas jaunākajiem skatītājiem.

programme.title: Маша и Медведь
programme.desc: Маша — невероятно активная девочка, которая никогда не сидит на месте и считает, что весь мир создан для неё одной. Машина индивидуальность не знает границ, поэтому урок труда легко оборачивается строительством парусного корабля, а набор художника — в разукрашивание всего леса.

programme.title: Приключения летающей собачки
programme.desc: Однажды щенок Випо узнал, что он особенный. Ведь он умеет летать с помощью своих огромных ушей! И теперь очаровательный песик и его лучшие друзья, аист Генри и игрушечная кошка Бетти, отправляются в захватывающее кругосветное путешествие.

programme.title: Инопланетяне
programme.desc: Пятеро странных, не похожих на людей инопланетных существ — Этно, Кенди, Горджис, Стерео и Бад — терпят крушение при посадке на Землю. Вернуться назад они не могут и вынуждены как-то осмыслять то, что происходит вокруг, за окнами заброшенного дома, в котором они скрытно поселились. Эти инопланетяне не любят скучать, поэтому постоянно выдумывают что-нибудь. А еще с ними приключаются забавные истории.

programme.title: Маша и Медведь
programme.desc: Маша — невероятно активная девочка, которая никогда не сидит на месте и считает, что весь мир создан для неё одной. Машина индивидуальность не знает границ, поэтому урок труда легко оборачивается строительством парусного корабля, а набор художника — в разукрашивание всего леса

programme.title: Приключения Тимми
programme.desc: "Маленький барашек Тимми, вместе со своими юными друзьями с фермы, отлично проводит время в детском саду, под надзором доброй цапли Гарриет и мудрого Филина Осборна. Там он учится многим хорошим вещам, в том числе и хорошему поведению. Немного упрямый и озорной Тимми может иногда напроказничать, но воспитатели всегда укажут ему на его ошибки и Тимми больше никогда не будет их повторять. О похождениях этого сорванца и будет идти речь в данном мультфильме."

programme.title: Приключения летающей собачки
programme.desc: Однажды щенок Випо узнал, что он особенный. Ведь он умеет летать с помощью своих огромных ушей! И теперь очаровательный песик и его лучшие друзья, аист Генри и игрушечная кошка Бетти, отправляются в захватывающее кругосветное путешествие.

Эти инопланетяне не любят скучать, поэтому постоянно выдумывают что-нибудь. А еще с ними приключаются забавные истории.

programme.title: Крошка Милтон
programme.desc: Крошка Милтон и в самом деле очень маленький. Он живет в часах, стоящих на каминной полке в гостиной. О существовании Милтона не знает никто, кроме его лучшего друга Дугласа — огромного лохматого пса, который целый день дремлет перед камином или спасает Милтона от многочисленных опасностей.

programme.title: Маленькая рыбка
programme.desc: Веселая и забавная рыбка по имени Пузырек очень хочет принести счастье своей семье!

programme.title: Приключения кота Леопольда
programme.desc: Доброму коту Леопольду, постоянно досаждают две мышки, требующие взаимности…

programme.title: Алиса в Стране чудес
programme.desc: Мультипликационный фильм по мотивам сказки Льюиса Кэрролла "Алиса в Стране Чудес".

programme.title: Приключения на волшебном острове
programme.desc: Прекрасная девочка Океана живет на райском острове вместе со своим дедушкой наставником. Другие дети постоянно дразнят ее за то, что у нее нет родителей. Из-за этого Океане становится грустно и одиноко, но она постепенно учится быть сильной и независимой. В этом ей помогает ее ум и хорошее чувство юмора. Океана не подозревает о своем прошлом, в котором была добрая фея, пираты и злой колдун. Ее мир переворачивается с ног на голову, когда колдун находит на дне океана магический кристальный шар. С его помощью колдун хочет захватить остров, и только Океана может его остановить. Герои этого мультфильма перенесут Вас в волшебный мир и с каждым новым эпизодом вы погрузитесь в атмосферу увлекательных приключений и веселых историй.

programme.title: Привет, Китти
programme.desc: "Замечательные мультфильмы серии Вместе с Hello Kitty научат малышей принимать ванну перед сном, правильно разговаривать по телефону, самим одеваться. Веселая музыка и яркие персонажи не оставят равнодушными малышей, а и их родители успеют отдохнуть, пока дети находятся ""в гостях"" у Китти!"

programme.title: Смешарики
programme.desc: Мультсериал о забавных круглых существах, живущих в собственном вымышленном мире. У каждого из них есть история жизни и свой, индивидуальный характер, среди Смешариков нет отрицательных персонажей.

programme.title: Пингвин
programme.desc: Маленький, непоседливый пингвин по имени Пингу, вечно попадает в разного рода неприятности. Из-за своего любопытства, упрямости и непослушания, эти неприятности, зачастую, перерастают в настоящие беды. Но после того, как из неприятностей и бед ему помогает выбраться семья и друзья, он понимает что к чему и больше не совершает допущенных им ошибок. Этот мультфильм наглядный пример поговорки, в которой говорится: "на ошибках учатся"

programme.title: Приключения барона Мюнхаузена
programme.desc: Были и небылицы. Мультфильм, снятый по одноименной книге Э. Распэ о приключениях барона Мюнхгаузена.

programme.title: Привет, Китти
programme.desc: "Замечательные мультфильмы серии Вместе с Hello Kitty научат малышей принимать ванну перед сном, правильно разговаривать по телефону, самим одеваться. programme.title: Машины сказки
programme.desc: Маша рассказывает своим игрушкам известные сказки народов мира в неповторимой детской манере — путая сюжеты и героев и завершая каждую историю неожиданным и остроумным выводом.

programme.desc: Доброму коту Леопольду, постоянно досаждают две мышки, требующие взаимности…

programme.title: 38 попугаев
programme.desc: Веселые истории о забавных приключениях четырех друзей — болтливой Мартышки, застенчивого Слоненка, разумного Попугая и задумчивого Удава.

programme.title: Весёлый грузовичок Олли
programme.desc: Олли — маленький веселый грузовичок, который только начинает познавать мир. По повадкам он очень похож на задорного любознательного щенка. Вместе со своими друзьями Олли нередко оказывается в переделках, решает непростые задачки, а также растет и развивается с юным зрителем.

programme.title: Обезьянки в опере
programme.desc: Тигр вместе с мамой-обезьянкой пошёл в театр на «Отелло». Из-за шаловливых обезьянок актриса-Дездемона сбежала, и по просьбе режиссера мама-обезьяна заменяет её.

programme.title: Машины сказки
programme.desc: Маша рассказывает своим игрушкам известные сказки народов мира в неповторимой детской манере — путая сюжеты и героев и завершая каждую историю неожиданным и остроумным выводом.

programme.title: Пингвин
programme.desc: Маленький, непоседливый пингвин по имени Пингу, вечно попадает в разного рода неприятности. Из-за своего любопытства, упрямости и непослушания, эти неприятности, зачастую, перерастают в настоящие беды. Но после того, как из неприятностей и бед ему помогает выбраться семья и друзья, он понимает что к чему и больше не совершает допущенных им ошибок. Этот мультфильм наглядный пример поговорки, в которой говорится: "на ошибках учатся"

programme.title: Приключения кота Леопольда
programme.desc: Доброму коту Леопольду, постоянно досаждают две мышки, требующие взаимности…

programme.title: Невероятные приключения гномов
programme.desc: Лесные Гномы живут очень долго. В их удивительной жизни есть время для праздников, катания на коньках, увлекательных гонок на сказочных животных, путешествий вместе с перелетными птицами и спасению Снежного Человека от злых лесных Тролей!

programme.title: Маша и Медведь
programme.desc: Маша — невероятно активная девочка, которая никогда не сидит на месте и считает, что весь мир создан для неё одной. Машина индивидуальность не знает границ, поэтому урок труда легко оборачивается строительством парусного корабля, а набор художника — в разукрашивание всего леса.

programme.title: Приключения летающей собачки
programme.desc: Однажды щенок Випо узнал, что он особенный. Ведь он умеет летать с помощью своих огромных ушей! И теперь очаровательный песик и его лучшие друзья, аист Генри и игрушечная кошка Бетти, отправляются в захватывающее кругосветное путешествие.

programme.title: Инопланетяне
programme.desc: Пятеро странных, не похожих на людей инопланетных существ — Этно, Кенди, Горджис, Стерео и Бад — терпят крушение при посадке на Землю. Вернуться назад они не могут и вынуждены как-то осмыслять то, что происходит вокруг, за окнами заброшенного дома, в котором они скрытно поселились. Эти инопланетяне не любят скучать, поэтому постоянно выдумывают что-нибудь. А еще с ними приключаются забавные истории.

programme.title: Приключения Тимми
programme.desc: "Маленький барашек Тимми, вместе со своими юными друзьями с фермы, отлично проводит время в детском саду, под надзором доброй цапли Гарриет и мудрого Филина Осборна. Там он учится многим хорошим вещам, в том числе и хорошему поведению. Немного упрямый и озорной Тимми может иногда напроказничать, но воспитатели всегда укажут ему на его ошибки и Тимми больше никогда не будет их повторять. О похождениях этого сорванца и будет идти речь в данном мультфильме."

Situation critical
programme.desc: Situation Critical is an American documentary series produced in partnership with the National Geographic Channel and explores devastating disasters and violent conflicts. In some cases these events changed more than the lives of those involved, altering the course of modern history. Among the events featured in this series are a North Hollywood shootout between Los Angeles Police Department and a pair of bank robbers, a Unites States Air Force pilot that is shot down over Bosnia and struggles to evade capture and several military operations that took place in the Middle East following the invasion of American forces.

programme.title: Atlas of Cursed Places
programme.desc: Everybody has heard about Dracula, a blood-thirsty monster who invokes immortality with a bite on the neck. But many believe the real Dracula was a 15th century eastern European ruler with a penchant for impaling enemies, Vlad Tepes, whose curse upon his homeland has lasted for six centuries. With the help of emerging science in the field of genetics, Sam investigates the curse of Vlad the Impaler.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: What would we find if we pulled the plug on our seas and oceans? This remarkable documentary series from the National Geographic Channel explores unseen seabeds to uncover the mysteries behind sunken vessels and long-lost ships. Using computer generated maps of the ocean floor, the team of scientists probe these unknown waters hoping to find some of history's missing ships and treasures. From lost cities to pirate ships, military vessels to relics from a different time, the team hope to understand more about how these legends were lost to the deep, dark depths.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: What would we find if we pulled the plug on our seas and oceans? This remarkable documentary series from the National Geographic Channel explores unseen seabeds to uncover the mysteries behind sunken vessels and long-lost ships. Using computer generated maps of the ocean floor, the team of scientists probe these unknown waters hoping to find some of history's missing ships and treasures. From lost cities to pirate ships, military vessels to relics from a different time, the team hope to understand more about how these legends were lost to the deep, dark depths.

programme.title: Is It Real?
programme.desc: Ignoring common sense and reason, people continue to believe in a host of supposed "supernatural phenomena". In a brand new series, National Geographic Channel exposes the myths and malarkey behind these enduring modern-day tales of the unexpected.

programme.title: Is It Real?
programme.desc: Is there really a giant primate running around the world's wilderness areas? Or are Bigfoot and his cousins around the world figments of our imagination? Examine the evidence for yourself with believers and skeptics alike: listen to tales of terrifying encounters, take a look at giant footprints, and examine the famous 1967 film. Follow the forensic trail – and a real sasquatch stakeout – as science goes after that most elusive of legendary creatures.

programme.title: Is It Real?
programme.desc: Do flying saucers really make interstellar pit-stops on planet Earth? The evidence abounds... videotape and photographs depict large, glowing, disc-like objects hovering over the countryside... mysterious, perfectly circular rings in the grass are discovered all over the globe... and real-life testimonies of close encounters are a dime a dozen. And each year, millions of people claim to be abducted by curious little aliens, who whisk them away in their mother ship and conduct terrifying experiments on them. Are extra-terrestrials plotting a take-over? Or, have we all just seen one too many science fiction films? We'll analyze the claims and dissect the evidence with astronomers, psychologists, and even a fungus expert... as we take a scientific spin through the outer limits.

programme.title: Do or Die
programme.desc: Do or Die is a series demonstrating people in desperate situations and their struggle to survive. The horrifying moments are caught on camera, the viewers can test their own instincts and choose one survival option out of three of what happens next, baring in mind that the two wrong answers may have deadly consequences. In real situations people have only some seconds to react. The series provides some survival tips and lifehack that can literally save someone's life.

programme.title: Do or Die
programme.desc: Do or Die is a series demonstrating people in desperate situations and their struggle to survive. The horrifying moments are caught on camera, the viewers can test their own instincts and choose one survival option out of three of what happens next, baring in mind that the two wrong answers may have deadly consequences. In real situations people have only some seconds to react. The series provides some survival tips and lifehack that can literally save someone's life.

programme.title: Continent 7: Antarctica
programme.desc: "Continent 7: Antarctica" will take you on a journey to Antarctica to experience the world's most extreme wilderness, to see the massive undertaking it is to support human life there, and to chronicle the world-changing science being done. Embed with missions on the ice, underneath it, and atop some of its peaks, as scientists and survival experts join forces to fight brutal conditions to help change the world.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Among the depths of the Norwegian mountains, terrifying conditions are camouflaged by the stunningly icy landscape. Who would have thought the fluffy blanket of snow could be so dangerous? Luckily for you, if you happen to become stuck in such conditions, a brave troupe of rescue workers will come to your aid. Pulling cars and trucks out of the worst of situations, Thord and his pals fight against the weather to keep the mountains as safe as possible. Whether it's a fatal accident, a vehicle stuck in the snow, or even catching smugglers in the act, on some of the most dangerous roads in Europe, it's a blessing to know you can rely on the rescue team to help you out.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: "Ice Road Rescue" portrays a group of heroic tow truck rescue workers. When winter hits Norway the transport roads turn into treacherous bobsleigh tracks. Every day the rescuers fight to keep this routes open by rescuing heavy trailers stuck in the mountain terrain. Winter storms, avalanches and lack of daylight through the winter season are just some of the challenges they have to face, working close to the polar circle. Extreme winter conditions that often make them risk their lives. "Ice Road Rescue" shows the ultimate man versus nature.

programme.title: Inside Incredible Machines
programme.desc: For forty years, Nimitz class aircraft carriers have delivered US military might wherever it is needed, anywhere on the globe. But now, this legendary design is being phased out and new carriers are planned. But until they're ready, the giant Nimitz ships have to be kept at the forefront of military technology. In this episode, engineer and host Chad Zdenek spends a week on board the USS Carl Vinson to work with the highly trained specialist engineers, mechanics and sailors who keep this incredible floating city in perfect working order during a critical mission in the Pacific – training twenty F18 pilots who have never taken off from an Aircraft Carrier before. This gives Chad the chance to discover the five engineering innovations at the heart of America's most incredible Aircraft Carrier.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna
programme.desc: Three new Captains arrive in Gloucester with one goal -- to defeat the local fleet. But they have their work cut out for them challenging the battle-proven Gloucester captains. Five-time champion Captain Dave Carraro of FV-Tuna.com feels the pressure as he fights to win another title, and the Gloucester captains and crews rally withand againsthim for bragging rights to their turf. In a fast-paced season, the brawl for bluefin comes down to the final fish, and a stunning finish for the seasons victor.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsey sets out on a journey to some of the worlds most remote locations, where he'll be looking for an adventure of the culinary kind. Basking in the culture of each setting he ends up, his cooking has never been more inspired than when on such an adventure. Whether he's cooking at altitude in Peru or educating himself on Alaskan cuisine, Gordon is experiencing the world like never before and beautifully curating a delicious morsel for each setting. It's a far cry from the professional kitchen he's used to and he's handling ingredients that are completely new, but the food doesn't get better than this.

programme.title: Cosmos: Possible Worlds
programme.desc: The human understanding of the universe is very limited but there is one man who believes that our future is greater than anyone thought possible. Neil deGrasse Tyson explores how we could look at space and space travel in the near and distant future, discussing our discovery of the laws of nature and how to find our exact coordinates in the universe. From our own planet we will take a journey through our solar system, galaxy and beyond to seek answers as to whether human habitation is possible on other planets and if there is, possibly, intelligent alien life already out there. The Cosmos is vast and holds endless answers yet even more questions. Asking those questions is only the beginning. Documentary series.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: What are miracles, and what might they mean? Morgan goes to Manhattan to meet a man who fell 47 stories and lived, and to Jerusalem, where he learns at Passover that miracles are the foundation of the Jewish faith. In Rome, he discovers how the Vatican makes saints through their miracles, and how ancient Romans believed the gods controlled every aspect of their lives. He explores the Chinese tradition of Daoism, in which miracles can happen because our lives are connected by a universal energy. Is a psychologist correct when he says miracles could be nothing more than random chance? Or could miracles come from the power of our minds? Cancer survivor Tom Renfro claims his recovery stemmed from the power of prayer. In India, at the site where the Buddha attained enlightenment, Morgan discovers that Buddhists believe all of us are capable of miracles, if we focus our minds.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: This spectacular aerial journey reveals Spain, as we've never seen it before. Flying cameras soar over the Sagrada Familia as architects work around the clock to finish the building. Daredevil barnacle hunters rappel down jagged cliffs to hunt for one of the world's most exclusive shellfish and we glide over one of the world's greatest abandoned buildings nestled deep in Spain's northern mountains.

programme.title: Eat: The Story of Food
programme.desc: Food. It's the substance and commodity many people center their lives around, transcending cultures and communities, transforming who we are as a species. This six-part documentary series from the National Geographic examines the history of food, revealing how our taste buds and demands have dramatically altered, and showcasing how different diets can have a far-reaching environmental and social impact. Experts provide a comprehensive summation on the origins of food, analysing the science behind foodstuffs and food products, and celebrity chefs such as Nigella Lawson and Rachel Ray offer their opinions on the evolution and revolution of food.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsey sets out on a journey to some of the worlds most remote locations, where he'll be looking for an adventure of the culinary kind. Basking in the culture of each setting he ends up, his cooking has never been more inspired than when on such an adventure. Whether he's cooking at altitude in Peru or educating himself on Alaskan cuisine, Gordon is experiencing the world like never before and beautifully curating a delicious morsel for each setting. It's a far cry from the professional kitchen he's used to and he's handling ingredients that are completely new, but the food doesn't get better than this.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: The intelligence team of the Federal Police has detected two passengers who could be traveling with drugs, but thanks to the work of the officers, they manage to intercept four suspects. Meanwhile, immigration agents must use all their imagination to communicate and gain the trust of a group of passengers who are apparently trying to enter the country irregularly. For their part, the customs agents must prevent counterfeit merchandise from entering the country.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: Tabitha Ritchies life is out of control: Shes a coke addict who rarely sees her two young boys, and she has few options left. When friends offer her a Colombian vacation to straighten herself out, she jumps. But Tabitha is about to enter a world far worse than the one shes escaping. When Philadelphia mom Kahlilah Saleem is forced to smuggle a bag filled with cocaine through Cuba, she does it in a desperate attempt to reunite with her daughter.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they don't happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: This American anthology period drama series is designed so that in each season the audience is introduced to a different iconic person who made a huge impact to the world and follows their life stories. The first season follows turbulent journey of the physicist who would grow to become the icon- Albert Einstein. Second season returns to explore the turbulent life of the 20th century's most controversial artist, Pablo Picasso and the subject of the third season will be American singer Aretha Franklin, known as "The Queen of Soul". This amazing series will change the way we see this incredible people, portrayed by famous actors, as we follow them through childhood to great discoveries, epic loves, complicated relationships, causes and their flaws.

programme.title: Genius

programme.title: Mars
programme.desc: From the National Geographic comes a science fiction series following a group of astronauts as they attempt to colonise Mars in 2033. With real-life scientists, the show is part documentary, part fictional narrative, as the scientists explain the actions of the astronauts in the dramatisations. The show is based on the book How We'll Live on Mars by Stephen Petranek and explores the difficulties the human race will endure if, or when, they attempt to set foot on the red planet. Created by Ben Young Mason and Justin Wilkes, the show was produced by Ron Howard and features performances from Ben Cotton, Jihae Kim, Clémentine Poidatz and Alberto Ammann.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.
